item.title: HW 2
item.description: Packages # Basic import numpy as np import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt # Statistics import scipy as sp import statsmodels.api as sm from statsmodels.stats.descriptivestats import describe import arch from statsmodels import graphics # Technical for Jupyter from IPython.display import Image HW description Image(filename='D://Empirical Finance/HW_2.png') Download the data For this second assignment, I simply have to code the predictive regressions in Chapter 3. This regressions were based on the data loaded to the blackboard, named “predictability”, which is an excel file.

item.title: My first post
item.description: 7 years come from the day when I entered university. For all this years, I have constantly developed my mind. Now, I feel more than enough to kick start this research campaign of my life !
